alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 05 at 6:45PM MDT until July 06 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter of a mile at times in dense fog. * WHERE...South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County which includes locations such as Buford, Horse Creek and Cheyenne. Between mile markers 343 and 383 on I-80 and along I-25 between the Wyoming/Colorado state line and mile marker 30. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If you are driving along I-80 and I-25 this evening and overnight be sure to slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
